ygData.subject: Amazon (Amazon Warrior)
ygData.msgSnippet: Although warrior is gender neutral, I kind of like Amazon or Amazon Warrior myself.  Sends a good message to the men that spend their time trying to flirt with
ygData.messageBody:
Although warrior is gender neutral, I kind of like Amazon or Amazon Warrior
myself. Sends a good message to the men that spend their time trying to
flirt with me instead of fighting. Anyone that knows anything about Amazons
knows what they do to male children!

For the Honor and Glory of Rallos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
